name: linkto-atom-helper

0.1.0.name: linkto-atom-helper
0.1.0.description: A link-to helper for dynatrace web-entity content

readme:
# linkto package

This plugin adds the linkto command to the atom command palette.

Linkto crawls all .markdown or .md files in your project structure and presents you a list of pages you can link to.

Linkto:pageid will present you the titles of every markdown file found in your project, that has a postid set. Upon selecting a file, the {% link_to_id %} liquid helper will be inserted at the cursor position.
